title.english: Kono Oto Tomare!: Sounds of Life Season 2

description:
The second season of Kono Oto Tomare!

Despite their best efforts during the Kanto Region Music Festival, the Koto Club is hit with the harsh reality of their poor performance. In the face of disappointment, they still decide to hone their skills and set sight on their next target.
synonyms: ฝากฝันไว้ที่เสียงโคโตะ! ภาค 2

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/amuse8)

__Agency:__ Intention

[Website](https://www.uchidayuma.com/) | [Profile](https://intention-k.com/profile/yuma_uchida) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuma_u_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/i_am_yumauchida)

A Japanese voice actor and singer. He made his singing debut in May 2018 under the King Records label. He is [Maaya Uchida](https://anilist.co/staff/108639/)'s younger brother.

His agency announced that he married the voice actress [Rina Hidaka](https://anilist.co/staff/100250) on January 1st, 2024.

__Awards:__
- In 2017, he won Best Male Newcomer at the 11th Seiyuu Awards for his role as [Hayate Immelmann](https://anilist.co/character/90102/).
- In 2019, he won Best Male Lead Actor at the 13th Seiyuu Awards for his role as [Ash Lynx](https://anilist.co/character/13580/).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Kaveh - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Aaron Wei (The Legend of Heroes Series)
- G'raha Tia - Final Fantasy XIV (VG)
-Anaxa - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

__[Official Website](http://www.shouta-aoi.jp/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/noboru0811) | [Personal Twitter](https://twitter.com/shouta0811aoi) | [Professional Twitter](https://twitter.com/AOISHOUTAstaff) | [Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/aoishoutaKING)__

Singer and voice actor since February 2011. Used to have a complex about his feminine voice, but he got over it because people liked that type of unique voice.

Ryuunosuke Matsushita in _Kimi to Boku_ was his first anime role. He also sings many insert songs in the same anime. Ai Mikaze from _UtaPri_ series is the role that made him popular. Debuted with the mini-album "Blue Bird" on June 26, 2013.

Junko Yamanaka is a Japanese designer and animator, who does character design, animation direction, in-between, key and 2nd key animation.

After graduating from high school, she joined [Yumeta Company](https://anilist.co/studio/96/Yumeta-Company) after working at an animation-related vocational school. After that, she left the company and became freelance.

Junko Yamanaka is a Japanese designer and animator, who does character design, animation direction, in-between, key and 2nd key animation.

After graduating from high school, she joined [Yumeta Company](https://anilist.co/studio/96/Yumeta-Company) after working at an animation-related vocational school. After that, she left the company and became freelance.

__[Artist Profile (Popholic)](https://popholic.jp/archives/author/ph-nagai)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/masa_olive)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/masamichi_nagai_bass/)__

__Birthplace:__ Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan

__Introduction:__
Masamichi Nagai is a Japanese bassist, lyricist, composer and arranger, who uses his melodies and emotional worldviews to pierce the hearts of his listeners when creating his everyday works. His unique aggressive bass style is one of the characteristics that defines him as a musician.

__Biography:__
When Masamichi was in high school, he was impressed when he saw a friend playing in a band. This made him interested in music, which led him to picking up the bass guitar. Later on he engaged in a vocational music school, where he aimed to become a professional.

He was awarded the best bassist individual award, and the band's best award during an ensemble.

__[Website](http://kikuyatomoki.com/)__

__Birthplace:__ Mitaka, Tokyo, Japan

__Introduction:__
Tomoki Kikuya is a Japanese composer and arranger, who works for music studio Popholic. His brother Kikuya Hiroki (菊谷宏樹), is the director of TVK's saku saku music show.

__Biography:__
Kikuya started a career as guitarist in the music band Mustang A.K.A under Sony Records. Later he was part of Funanori. Starting from 2005 Kikuya decided to focus on working as a music composer and arranger. He has arranged and composed several songs featured in anime since then, starting with theme songs for Pani Poni Dash.

__[Artist Profile (Avex Management)](https://avex-management.jp/artists/creator/CRHIB)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hibino_hirofumi)__

__Birthplace:__ Gifu Prefecture, Japan

__Hirofumi Hibino__ is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, music producer and guitarist, who is active in the anime scene as an arranger and composer. His interested aligns with the piano, which he has had ever since his childhood. When he was 14 he picked up the guitar, when he turned 18 he was already a full-fledged artist, working as a freelancer.

Daman Mills is an American voice actor affiliated with FUNimation Entertainment.
